website_summaries.verdict: While buyers say it's not much to look at, this boot offers attractive support and warmth for winter use.
pros: Good support in general, and the included arch supports help even more
Excellent quality in a lightweight boot
cons: Boot runs a little large, so plan on buying a half-size smaller
This option takes a few outings to break in

customer_reviews.title: Bad mold on left foot, but still a great boot
customer_reviews.text: We (husband and wife) each bought a pair. Both pairs hurt our left feet at exactly the same spot above the heel and required a lot of leather softener to break in. The right fit great and broke in quickly. Otherwise, great boot and great traction on slippery steep shale and mossy rock. Extremely well made, should last for many years with proper care.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots!! I was worried after reading other's posts, but my size is 9.5, but I ordered a 10 because of the thicker-socks-theory. Fit perfectly! They came in the Danner box, with the inserts and feel great!! Just need to be broken in of course. I would recommend to anyone who's looking for a lifelong hiking/work boot. They look good too!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna K Street

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, well made boot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boot but evidently runs large. I normally wear an 8 so that is what I ordered but it is a size to a size and a half too large.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The remaining fit of the shoe is very comfortable except for the blister that forms quickly at the ...
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe from the heel to the top of the neck slopes in (forward) very dramatically making the neck of the shoe rub unless you are climbing straight up a mountain. The remaining fit of the shoe is very comfortable except for the blister that forms quickly at the back of my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome boots! make sure to wear good socks to prevent blistering ankle!
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: hurt my ankle
customer_reviews.text: the exposed edge leather inside the shoe really hurt my ankle like hell, returned
customer_reviews.author: lalala

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased property in Arkansas, and I've used these boots a lot. They are comfortable (the heal inserts that came with the boots make a lot of difference). I'm a Danner boots gal from way back - my last pair lasted 30 years of VERY hard wear, and still only wore out because I stopped treating the leather - my bad entirely - and I'm excited to have this beautiful new pair that will last forever, if properly cared for.
customer_reviews.author: SueC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I wear 5.5 but I got 6 which feets better. Very good quality hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: Karo

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I didn't have any of the problems others mentioned. They aren't too narrow or uncomfortable around the ankles. They will need a breaking-in period, but that is to be expected with quality boots. Would absolutely recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Danner Boot Review
customer_reviews.text: Boots are great but I wish I got 1/2 size smaller. I guess they run larger than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are roomy as most have described but socks can fix that
customer_reviews.author: Tra B

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: They need some breaking in at the top, but the foot bed itself is perfect. They were not wide at all. I'm looking forward to enjoying many hikes in these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Anniefletch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got a blister on heel first time I wore them
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Roff

customer_reviews.title: Blistering of ankles!
customer_reviews.text: These boots blistered by ankle. It is unfortunate because they are well made boots that could have lasted me a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Duran

customer_reviews.title: The shoe size is measured by men's feet!
customer_reviews.text: The size of the shoe is incorrect.It measured by men's feet! And this shoe is a gift I give to my friend.I don't know the wrong size until one year later.This really let me look bad in front of my friend!
customer_reviews.author: shang

customer_reviews.title: I like them and it's almost time to re-sole them
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these boots for over a year now (pretty much every day). I like them and it's almost time to re-sole them. And being able to re-sole them is one of the reasons I purchased these boots. I'm happy with the fit and finish. I regularly apply beeswax on the leather. I am not worried about the arch support as I wear custom orthotics
customer_reviews.author: M Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Good timing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because of owning a pair in the '70's that lasted for many backpacking and global treks. They are heavier than than my goretex Timberlines that have give warmth and comfort, but proved their functionality during this last snow/freeze. Very glad to have them since they trek nicely in snow and more rugged terrain. There is a stiffness that should ease up with wear. All in all still a great boot that manages to look better than you think.
customer_reviews.author: OnestKT

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL BOOTS BUT NOT A PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: I have normal 7.5 feet in footwear, And was sorry that these boots were Not a perfect fit. The boots seem to run wide, and my feet slip in them. Since the boots are so well constructed, and the price was a bargain with a Amazon sale, I kept them.I am making them fit with double socks. There are not many options for women's waterproof boots made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Dirtgirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & classic Made In USA Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are just the best hiking boots out there in my opinion. Extremely well made in the USA, short break-in period and last for years. Sure, they're a bit more expensive than the Chinese sweatshop boots, but they are bombproof & supremely comfortable. I think they have made this style for many years as they are a classic that never goes out of style!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Post

customer_reviews.title: It's a pair of solid boots but not fashion
customer_reviews.text: It's a pair of solid boots but not fashion.Although I read the information of this boot before I brought, I still have something disappointed about the outlook. I hope the boot will last a long time to wear as someone said. But if you want a pair of fashionable boot,don't choose these...
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

product_meta.title: Danner Women's Mountain Light II 5" Gore-Tex Hiking Boot
feature_bullets: Durable, one-piece full-grain leather upper [Black, Brown]
Danner Airthotic heel cradle and arch support
Handcrafted, stitchdown construction for strength and stability. Fiberglass shank.
Vibram 148 Kletterlift outsole offers superior traction, stability and shock absorption on rugged terrain
